phrases.pt: A escola avisou-nos com antecedência.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ ɐviˈzou nuʃ kõ ɐ̃tɨsɨˈdẽsjɐ

translations.text: The school informed us in advance.

phrases.pt: A minha filha está muito cansada hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈmiɲɐ ˈfiʎɐ ʃˈta ˈmũjtu kɐ̃ˈsadɐ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: My daughter is very tired today.

phrases.pt: Precisamos de falar com a professora.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨsiˈzɐmuʃ dɨ fɐˈlaɾ kõ ɐ pɾufɨˈsoɾɐ

translations.text: We need to talk to the teacher.

phrases.pt: Ele esqueceu-se do trabalho de casa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɨ ɨʃkɨˈsewsɨ du tɾɐˈbaʎu dɨ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: He forgot his homework.

phrases.pt: Hoje houve um problema na escola.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ˈoβɨ ˈũ pɾuˈblɛmɐ nɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ

translations.text: There was a problem at school today.

phrases.pt: A reunião é amanhã de manhã.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ʁɨũˈɐ̃w ɛ ɐmɐˈɲɐ̃ dɨ mɐˈɲɐ̃

translations.text: The meeting is tomorrow morning.

phrases.pt: Ela está a adaptar-se aos poucos.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɐ ʃˈta ɐ dɐptɐɾˈsɨ awʃ ˈpokus

translations.text: She is slowly adapting.

phrases.pt: Isso é normal para a idade dela.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu ɛ noɾˈmaɫ ˈpaɾɐ ɐ iˈdadɨ ˈdelɐ

translations.text: That’s normal for her age.

phrases.pt: Temos de ajudar com os deveres de casa.
phrases.ru: Нам нужно помочь с домашними заданиями.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ ɐʒuˈdaɾ kõ uʃ dɨˈveɾɨʃ dɨ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: We need to help with the homework.

phrases.pt: A escola pediu uma autorização assinada.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ pɨˈdiu ˈumɐ ɐwtɔɾizɐˈsɐ̃w ɐsiˈnadɐ

translations.text: The school asked for a signed permission slip.

phrases.pt: Hoje ela chegou a casa mais cedo.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ˈelɐ ʃɨˈɡou ɐ ˈkazɐ ˈmajʃ ˈseɾu

translations.text: Today she got home earlier.

phrases.pt: Ele não se sentiu bem durante as aulas.
phrases.ru: Ему стало плохо во время уроков.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɨ nɐ̃w sɨ sẽˈtiu bẽ duˈɾɐ̃tɨ ɐʃ ˈawlɐʃ

translations.text: He didn’t feel well during the classes.

phrases.pt: A professora enviou uma mensagem.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ pɾufɨˈsoɾɐ ẽviˈou ˈumɐ mẽˈsaʒẽj

translations.text: The teacher sent a message.

phrases.pt: Temos de preparar a mochila para amanhã.
phrases.ru: Нам нужно подготовить рюкзак на завтра.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ pɾɨpɐˈɾaɾ ɐ muˈʃilɐ ˈpaɾɐ ɐmɐˈɲɐ̃

translations.text: We need to prepare the backpack for tomorrow.

phrases.pt: Hoje houve uma atividade especial na escola.
phrases.ru: Сегодня в школе было специальное мероприятие.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ˈoβɨ ˈumɐ ɐtiviˈdadɨ ʃpɨsˈjaɫ nɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ

translations.text: There was a special activity at school today.

phrases.pt: Ela está um pouco nervosa com o teste.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɐ ʃˈta ˈũ ˈpoku nɛɾˈvozɐ kõ u ˈtɛʃtɨ

translations.text: She’s a bit nervous about the test.

phrases.pt: O horário da escola mudou esta semana.
phrases.ru: Расписание школы изменилось на этой неделе.
phrases.ipa_transcription: u oˈɾaɾju dɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ muˈdou ˈeʃtɐ sɨˈmɐnɐ

translations.text: The school schedule changed this week.

phrases.pt: Ele precisa de mais tempo para se concentrar.
phrases.ru: Ему нужно больше времени, чтобы сосредоточиться.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɨ pɾɨˈsizɐ dɨ ˈmajʃ ˈtẽpu ˈpaɾɐ sɨ kõsẽtɾɐɾ

translations.text: He needs more time to concentrate.

phrases.pt: A escola organizou uma reunião de pais.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ oɾɡɐniˈzou ˈumɐ ʁɨũˈɐ̃w dɨ ˈpajʃ

translations.text: The school organised a parents’ meeting.

phrases.pt: Ela gosta muito da nova professora.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɐ ˈɡɔʃtɐ ˈmũjtu dɐ ˈnɔβɐ pɾufɨˈsoɾɐ

translations.text: She really likes the new teacher.

phrases.pt: Hoje ele teve dificuldades na aula.
phrases.ru: Сегодня у него были трудности на уроке.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ˈelɨ ˈtɛvɨ difikulˈdadɨʃ nɐ ˈawlɐ

translations.text: He had difficulties in class today.

phrases.pt: Temos de falar sobre isso com calma.
phrases.ru: Нам нужно спокойно об этом поговорить.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ fɐˈlaɾ ˈsoβɾɨ ˈisu kõ ˈkaɫmɐ

translations.text: We need to talk about this calmly.

phrases.pt: Ela esqueceu-se do lanche hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɐ ɨʃkɨˈsewsɨ du ˈlɐ̃ʃɨ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: She forgot her snack today.

phrases.pt: O professor pediu mais atenção em aula.
phrases.ru: Учитель попросил быть внимательнее на уроке.
phrases.ipa_transcription: u pɾufɨˈsoɾ pɨˈdiu ˈmajʃ ɐtẽˈsɐ̃w ẽ ˈawlɐ

translations.text: The teacher asked for more attention in class.

phrases.pt: Ele ficou contente com a nota.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɨ fiˈkou kõˈtẽtɨ kõ ɐ ˈnɔtɐ

translations.text: He was happy with the grade.

phrases.pt: Hoje ela não quis ir à escola.
phrases.ru: Сегодня она не хотела идти в школу.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ˈelɐ nɐ̃w ˈkiʃ iɾ a ʃˈkɔlɐ

translations.text: Today she didn’t want to go to school.

phrases.pt: A escola enviou um aviso importante.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ ẽviˈou ˈũ ɐˈvizu ĩpoɾˈtɐ̃tɨ

translations.text: The school sent an important notice.

phrases.pt: Ele precisa de descansar depois das aulas.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɨ pɾɨˈsizɐ dɨ dɨʃkɐ̃ˈsaɾ dɨˈpojʃ dɐʃ ˈawlɐʃ

translations.text: He needs to rest after classes.

phrases.pt: Ela está a aprender a organizar-se melhor.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɐ ʃˈta ɐ ɐpɾẽˈdeɾ ɐ oɾɡɐniˈzaɾsɨ mɨˈʎɔɾ

translations.text: She is learning to organise herself better.

phrases.pt: Temos de verificar o calendário escolar.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ vɨɾifiˈkaɾ u kɐlẽˈdaɾju ʃkɔˈlaɾ

translations.text: We need to check the school calendar.

phrases.pt: Hoje ele trouxe trabalhos para terminar.
phrases.ru: Сегодня он принёс задания, которые нужно закончить.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ˈelɨ ˈtɾoʃɨ tɾɐˈbaʎuʃ ˈpaɾɐ tɨɾmiˈnaɾ

translations.text: Today he brought work to finish.

phrases.pt: A escola recomendou falar com um especialista.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ ʁɨkõmẽˈdou fɐˈlaɾ kõ ˈũ ʃpɨsɨɐˈliʃtɐ

translations.text: The school recommended speaking to a specialist.

phrases.pt: Ela ficou chateada depois da aula.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɐ fiˈkou ʃɐˈteɐdɐ dɨˈpojʃ dɐ ˈawlɐ

translations.text: She was upset after the class.

phrases.pt: O professor explicou a situação com calma.
phrases.ipa_transcription: u pɾufɨˈsoɾ ʃplɨˈkou ɐ sitwɐˈsɐ̃w kõ ˈkaɫmɐ

translations.text: The teacher explained the situation calmly.

phrases.pt: Temos de apoiar mais nesta fase.
phrases.ru: Нам нужно больше поддерживать на этом этапе.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ ɐpoˈjaɾ ˈmajʃ ˈneʃtɐ ˈfazɨ

translations.text: We need to give more support at this stage.

phrases.pt: Ela está a fazer progressos aos poucos.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɐ ʃˈta ɐ fɐˈzeɾ pɾoˈɡɾɛsuʃ awʃ ˈpokus

translations.text: She is making progress little by little.

phrases.pt: Hoje houve mudanças no plano escolar.
phrases.ru: Сегодня были изменения в школьном плане.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ˈoβɨ muˈdɐ̃sɐʃ nu ˈplɐnu ʃkɔˈlaɾ

translations.text: There were changes to the school plan today.

phrases.pt: Ele precisa de ajuda com a leitura.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈelɨ pɾɨˈsizɐ dɨ ɐˈʒudɐ kõ ɐ lɐjˈtuɾɐ

translations.text: He needs help with reading.

phrases.pt: A escola pediu feedback aos pais.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ pɨˈdiu ˈfidbɛk awʃ ˈpajʃ

translations.text: The school asked parents for feedback.

phrases.pt: Vamos falar disso novamente com a escola.
phrases.ru: Давайте ещё раз обсудим это со школой.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈvɐmuʃ fɐˈlaɾ ˈdisu novɐˈmẽtɨ kõ ɐ ʃˈkɔlɐ

translations.text: Let’s discuss this again with the school.
